name: ContinuousEval.continuous_eval
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
X : outParam (Type u_2)
Y : outParam (Type u_3)
instâœÂ³ : FunLike F X Y
instâœÂ² : TopologicalSpace F
instâœÂ¹ : TopologicalSpace X
instâœ : TopologicalSpace Y
self : ContinuousEval F X Y
âŠ¢ Continuous fun fx => fx.1 fx.2
decl:
/-- A typeclass saying that `F` is a bundled morphism class (in the sense of `FunLike`)
with a topology such that `fun (f, x) : F Ã— X â†¦ f x` is a continuous function. -/
class ContinuousEval (F : Type*) (X Y : outParam Type*) [FunLike F X Y]
    [TopologicalSpace F] [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop where
  /-- Evaluation of a bundled morphism at a point is continuous in both variables. -/
  continuous_eval : Continuous fun fx : F Ã— X â†¦ fx.1 fx.2

name: Continuous.eval
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
X : Type u_2
Y : Type u_3
Z : Type u_4
instâœâµ : FunLike F X Y
instâœâ´ : TopologicalSpace F
instâœÂ³ : TopologicalSpace X
instâœÂ² : TopologicalSpace Y
instâœÂ¹ : ContinuousEval F X Y
instâœ : TopologicalSpace Z
f : Z â†’ F
g : Z â†’ X
hf : Continuous f
hg : Continuous g
âŠ¢ Continuous fun z => (f z) (g z)
decl:
@[continuity, fun_prop]
protected theorem Continuous.eval (hf : Continuous f) (hg : Continuous g) :
    Continuous fun z â†¦ f z (g z) :=
  continuous_eval.comp (hf.prod_mk hg)

initialProofState:

hf : autoParam (âˆ€ (g : F'), Eq â‡‘(f g) â‡‘g) _autoâœ

decl:
/-- If a type `F'` of bundled morphisms admits a continuous projection
to a type satisfying `ContinuousEval`,
then `F'` satisfies this predicate too.

The word "forget" in the name is motivated by the term "forgetful functor". -/
theorem ContinuousEval.of_continuous_forget {F' : Type*} [FunLike F' X Y] [TopologicalSpace F']
    {f : F' â†’ F} (hc : Continuous f) (hf : âˆ€ g, â‡‘(f g) = g := by intro; rfl) :
    ContinuousEval F' X Y where
  continuous_eval := by simpa only [â† hf] using hc.fst'.eval continuous_snd

name: ContinuousEval.toContinuousMapClass
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
X : Type u_2
Y : Type u_3
instâœâ´ : FunLike F X Y
instâœÂ³ : TopologicalSpace F
instâœÂ² : TopologicalSpace X
instâœÂ¹ : TopologicalSpace Y
instâœ : ContinuousEval F X Y
âŠ¢ ContinuousMapClass F X Y
decl:
instance (priority := 100) ContinuousEval.toContinuousMapClass : ContinuousMapClass F X Y where
  map_continuous _ := continuous_const.eval continuous_id

instance (priority := 100) ContinuousEval.toContinuousEvalConst : ContinuousEvalConst F X Y where

protected theorem Filter.Tendsto.eval {Î± : Type*} {l : Filter Î±} {f : Î± â†’ F} {fâ‚€ : F}
    {g : Î± â†’ X} {xâ‚€ : X} (hf : Tendsto f l (ð“ fâ‚€)) (hg : Tendsto g l (ð“ xâ‚€)) :
    Tendsto (fun a â†¦ f a (g a)) l (ð“ (fâ‚€ xâ‚€)) :=
  (ContinuousEval.continuous_eval.tendsto _).comp (hf.prod_mk_nhds hg)
